forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plenty of sunshine. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 61F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
